## Calendar.getDays() method

A list of calendar days

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDays(info?: CalendarInfo, minWeeks?: number): CalendarDateInfo[][];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  info | [CalendarInfo](./fast-foundation.calendarinfo.md) | an object containing the information needed to render a calendar month |
|  minWeeks | number | minimum number of weeks to show |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CalendarDateInfo](./fast-foundation.calendardateinfo.md)<!-- -->\[\]\[\]

a list of days in a calendar month
